title: User Kernel Quit
body: I have a Mac OS Sierra and last week it was working. This week when I try to open the application it goes onto the dock but then goes away quickly, and it sometimes says that my user kernel keeps quitting on me  but when I look in my files for league user kernel is there and it has the league icon on it. What should I do??? Please help I really wanna play one ofr all.

replies.body:
This may be caused by League missing specific administrative privileges it requires in order to operate correctly. I recommend configuring your system permissions with [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) to ensure everything can run correctly.

Let me know if this helped!

I don't think it was that because I tried on my other laptop as well and it didn't work either. I think it might be something with the download. On both mac and windows.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thanks I havnt tried yet but I will and will let you know if it works. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
